Html:
Hello,

It is somehow possible to insert a chart to a worksheet? Do you plan to allocate this function?

Thank you

Evandar

At the moment, Excel Charts are not supported within PHPExcel.

This is a major feature that I am currently working on, but it is a significant amount of work and unlikely to be in a state for inclusion within the package for some months yet.

An alternative is to use any of the standard PHP graphic libraries (pChart, graphpite, jpGraph, etc) to create the chart you want as an image, and then embed that image file within your spreadsheets.

yes, but I need excel charts working with filters ... I am looking forward to it will be done. This project is great, I am suprised what everything does it handle. And how fast it is! Thank you! :)

Evandar
